page.title: 19MADELEY STAFFS : HAPPENINGS
page.content: All organisations at times stage events for funds,but 2 happenings occur yearly 1 is the Madeley Fete,once held in the Manor Park with artistes like Blondin, now a smaller affair with a Queen & floats,stalls,routines by Keep Fit Ladies,& girls'teams drilling to music- at the High School.The other is the October Marathon when hundreds walk for charity.Two events in 1985 were one-off On July 12~ the Bishop of Stafford in- stituted Malcolm Griffin to the living of All Saints. Bells,flowers & music made it a memorable occasion.The church wardens welcomed the new vicar & his family during the service.Clergy,guests from Berkswich were entertained later. The other was a County Walk hosted by our WI for the County on September.29~. 85 people walked 5 miles climbed 14 stiles,for fun,within our Project area, & sat down to tea in the Village Hall.
